name: OR_LNLG_XRAY_RESULT
description: This table holds whether or not the radiologist has contacted the surgeon with the results of the x-ray.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: XRAY_RESULT_COMM_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the radiologist has contacted the surgeon with results.
